Uses of Package
uk.ac.liv.auction.core

Packages that use uk.ac.liv.auction.core
uk.ac.liv.auction The top-level package for JASA classes. 
uk.ac.liv.auction.agent Classes defining trading agents and strategies 
uk.ac.liv.auction.core The core classes used by JASA 
uk.ac.liv.auction.electricity   
uk.ac.liv.auction.event   
uk.ac.liv.auction.speculation   
uk.ac.liv.auction.stats Classes for calculating auction statistics 
uk.ac.liv.auction.ui User-interface auction components 
uk.ac.liv.auction.zi Classes for implementing "zero-intelligence" experiments. 
uk.ac.liv.supplyChain   
 

Classes in uk.ac.liv.auction.core used by uk.ac.liv.auction
Auctioneer
           
RandomRobinAuction
           A class representing an auction in which RoundRobinTraders can trade by placing shouts in a synchronous round-robin shedule.

          An abstract class representing an auctioneer managing shouts in an auction.

          An auctioneer for a clearing house auction.

          This is exception is thrown when requesting data from an auction that is not available due to the way that the auction is configured.

Classes in uk.ac.liv.auction.core used by uk.ac.liv.auction.core
AbstractAuctioneer
          An abstract class representing an auctioneer managing shouts in an auction.
Account
           
AscendingShoutComparator
          This class can be used to as a Comparator to rank shouts in ascending order.
Auction
           
AuctionClosedException
           
AuctionClosingCondition
          The interface for expressing the condition of closing an auction.
Auctioneer
           
AuctioneerTest
           
AuctionException
           
AuctionImpl
          An abstract implementation of Auction that provides basic logging facilities.
ClearingHouseAuctioneer
          An auctioneer for a clearing house auction.
ContinuousDoubleAuctioneer
          An auctioneer for a double-auction with continuous clearing.
DataUnavailableException
          This is exception is thrown when requesting data from an auction that is not available due to the way that the auction is configured.
DayEndingCondition
          The interface for expressing the condition of ending an auction day.
DescendingShoutComparator
          A comparator that can be used for arranging shouts in descending order; that is, highest price first.
DiscriminatoryPricingPolicy
           A pricing policy in which we set the transaction price in the interval between the matched prices as determined by the parameter k.
DuplicateShoutException
           
FourHeapShoutEngine
           This class provides auction shout management services using the 4-Heap algorithm.
IllegalShoutException
          This exception is thrown by auctioneers when a shout placed in an auction is illegal under the rules of the auction.
KPricingPolicy
          Abstract superclass for auctioneer pricing policies parameterised by k.
MarketClearingCondition
          The interface for expressing the condition of clearing the current market.
MarketQuote
          A price quote summarising the current state of an auction.
McAfeeClearingHouseAuctioneer
          An implementation of the mechanism described in "A Dominant Strategy Double Auction" R.
NotAnImprovementOverQuoteException
          This exception is thrown by an auctioneer implementing the NYSE rule if a trader agent attempts to place a shout that is not an improvement over the current best bid.
PricingPolicy
          Classes implementing this interface define pricing policies for auctioneers.
QuoteBeatingAcceptingPolicy
          implements the NYSE rule under which a shout must improve the market quote to be acceptable.
QuoteProvider
           
RandomRobinAuction
           A class representing an auction in which RoundRobinTraders can trade by placing shouts in a synchronous round-robin shedule.
RoundClearingCondition
          The interface for expressing the condition of clearing the current market.
Shout
           A class representing a shout in an auction.
Shout.MutableShout
          A Shout that is publically mutable.
ShoutAcceptingPolicy
          Classes implementing this interface define policies for accepting shouts.
ShoutEngine
           
ShoutsNotVisibleException
          This exception is thrown if an agent attempts to examine the shouts of other agents in an auction where the auctioneer does not permit agents to see each others shouts.
TestShoutEngine
           
TimingCondition
          The interface for expressing the condition of closing a certain time interval, such as an auction, or a day.
TransparentAuctioneer
           
ZeroCreditAccount
